name: Djinn
description:
Arabic themed puzzle game where you age quickly and die. You can pass on information to the next player by audio. Press many keys to start. Don't become a skeleton, free them souls.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2018 by Valentijn Muijrers, Manuel Kerssemakers, Jelle van Aanholt, Bart Roozen en Krzysztof Soroka
